marklogic.body: Oh so that's why I've not been able to get those ephedrine tablets lately. Ephedrine has no addiction what so ever. It is a great Weight loss drug and from my one year experience of using it, I've found it absolutely harmless. Oh and I used it for a year and then totally stopped taking it when I thought I've lost enough weight. And never felt an urge to use it again. At least not until 2 years later I finished college and started Gaining weight again. Only to find out some Weight loss supplement companies have finally taken down ephedrine because this simple chemical works way better than their supplements.
